###
contents:
Lead in the age of generative AI
#

In the last 30 years, no technology has promised to change everything across a business—until generative AI. Today, AI is the number one driver of business reinvention. And data readiness is one of the most important factors for AI success.
##

Data and AI now
97%
of executives said generative AI will transform their company and industry
67%
of organizations plan to increase spending in technology and are prioritizing investments in data and AI
75% 
of executives said that “good quality data” is the most valuable ingredient to enhance their generative AI capabilities
10-15%
more revenue growth is achieved by data-driven companies than by their peers
#

Ready your data for the new demands of generative AI 
[131]
47% of CXOs say data-readiness is the top challenge in applying generative Al. Building a modern data foundation is the first investment companies must make to realize the true value of Al and gen AI. 
Learn more
Data Services  Ready your data for the new demands of generative AI  47% of CXOs say data-readiness is the top challenge in applying generative Al. Building a modern data foundation is the first investment companies must make to realize the true value of Al and gen AI.  Learn more [129]
[130]
Close
Responsible AI 
##

Close the gap between responsible AI intention and execution 
You must trust AI to get value from it. Take intentional steps to operationalize responsible AI across your enterprise to create value, build trust and protect your company from risk. 
Learn more
Responsible AI  Close the gap between responsible AI intention and execution  You must trust AI to get value from it. Take intentional steps to operationalize responsible AI across your enterprise to create value, build trust and protect your company from risk.  Learn more[132]
[133]
Close
Generative AI 
##

Use generative AI to drive growth and productivity across the enterprise 
[136]
97% of companies know gen AI is transformative but only 31% have invested significantly. Scale across functions and refine LLMs with your data to increase productivity, accuracy, and business context. 
Learn more
Generative AI  Use generative AI to drive growth and productivity across the enterprise  97% of companies know gen AI is transformative but only 31% have invested significantly. Scale across functions and refine LLMs with your data to increase productivity, accuracy, and business context.  Learn more [134]
[135]
Close
AI Strategy and Value 
##

Where can you apply gen AI for the largest ROI? 
Embrace generative AI to assess your entire value chain on an ongoing basis and continually suggest where it can give you the best ROI, putting you on a never-ending improvement curve. 
Learn more
AI Strategy and Value  Where can you apply gen AI for the largest ROI?  Embrace generative AI to assess your entire value chain on an ongoing basis and continually suggest where it can give you the best ROI, putting you on a never-ending improvement curve.  Learn more[137]
[138]
Close
AI Talent and Workforce 
##

Get your workforce ready for AI 
Generative AI puts people at the heart of reinvention, and organizations need to prepare their employees, reshape their workforce and reinvent work for the gen AI era. 
Learn more
AI Talent and Workforce  Get your workforce ready for AI  Generative AI puts people at the heart of reinvention, and organizations need to prepare their employees, reshape their workforce and reinvent work for the gen AI era.  Learn more[139]
[140]
Close
Accenture AI Refinery 
##

Scale AI across the enterprise 
Only 9% of companies have fully deployed an AI use case due to scaling challenges. AI Refinery™ is a comprehensive platform that addresses the barriers to scaling and drives reinvention through AI. 
Learn more
Accenture AI Refinery  Scale AI across the enterprise  Only 9% of companies have fully deployed an AI use case due to scaling challenges. AI Refinery™ is a comprehensive platform that addresses the barriers to scaling and drives reinvention through AI.  Learn more[141]

#

Awards and recognition 
Everest Group Leader and Star Performer in data & analytics and AI & gen AI
##

Everest Group Leader and Star Performer in data & analytics and AI & gen AI
Everest Group positioned Accenture as the highest Leader among service providers in two PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2024 reports: Data and Analytics, and Artificial Intelligence and Generative AI.
Learn more[176]
Databricks partner of the year - 6th year in a row
##

Databricks partner of the year - 6th year in a row
Accenture enables Databricks customers to break down silos, create more agile and adaptive processes, and power data-driven decision-making to solve business problems and identify new opportunities.
Learn more[177]
Snowflake partner of the year - 2nd year in a row
##

Snowflake partner of the year - 2nd year in a row
Accenture was named global System Integrator Services Delivery Partner of the Year by Snowflake.
Learn more[178]
